Class RetrieveEmailsUsingIMAP

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • getConnectedStatus

        public java.lang.String getConnectedStatus​(java.lang.String protocol,
                                           java.lang.String host,
                                           java.lang.String port,
                                           java.lang.String userName,

        This method is use to check whether user entered credentials are correct or not. If connection established then credentials are correct otherwise not.
        Parameters:
        protocol - imap
        host - imap.gmail.com
        port - port 993
        userName - user's gmail "****gmail.com"
        password - user's password

        boolean value for connection status

      • getText

        public static java.lang.String getText​(javax.mail.Part p)
                                throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        This method is use to handle MIME message. a message with an attachment is represented in MIME as a multipart message. In the simple case, the results of the Message object's getContent method will be a MimeMultipart object. The first body part of the multipart object will be the main text of the message. The other body parts will be attachments.
        Parameters:
        p - message
        Returns:
        null
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
        java.io.IOException
